item.title: [SCRUM-66] 4.3.2. Verify pager navigation between expenses and income
pre-conditions: 2. Chrome browser is installed on desktop;
steps: 1. Login with a valid email and password;
expected results: 1. Main page is loaded. Reports button is visible.
2. Reports page is loaded. Expenses and income are visible;
3. The pager navigation between expenses and income is visible;
4. The pager navigation between expenses and income is visible;
5. The pager navigation between expenses and income is visible.
